ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to calculate pairwise relatedness on diploid genetic datasets. Different estimators for relatedness can be combined with information on geographical distances. Information on heterozygosity, allele- and genotype diversity as well as genetic F-statistics are provided for each population.

Functions to calculate pairwise relatedness on diploid genetic datasets. Different estimators for relatedness can be combined with information on geographical distances. Information on heterozygosity, allele- and genotype diversity as well as genetic F-statistics are provided for each population.

name: r-demerelate
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.9-3' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-demerelate
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: Demerelate_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Demerelate_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Demerelate/Demerelate_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4901bb4643351b6d9940ccc20194cf228161979549a08eed87005a135b024eaf

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - r-fts
    - r-mlogit
    - r-sfsmisc
    - r-vegan

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-fts
    - r-mlogit
    - r-sfsmisc
    - r-vegan

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('Demerelate')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('Demerelate')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Demerelate
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'
  summary: Functions to calculate pairwise relatedness on diploid genetic datasets. Different
    estimators for relatedness can be combined with information on geographical distances.
    Information on heterozygosity, allele- and genotype diversity as well as genetic
    F-statistics are provided for each population.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - nsoranzo
